Project GitHub

Learning Management System

About this project

Final SWEN303(User Experience) project. My team and I where tasked to develop a new LMS aimed at universities, focusing in encating UX techiques such as personas and senarios, navigation maps, wireframes, and usability testing, with the final result being the software prototype.
